captions.text: Everyday GIRL'S DAY! Hello, this is GIRL'S DAY
NG! We have to go again, stop shaking your legs
#ashtag Interview: Artists pick keywords about themselves
Are other girl groups as loud as we are?
Everyday GIRL'S DAY! Hello, this is GIRL'S DAY
We're back with a digital single, "I miss you"
The song's about missing and longing for an ex
I think it will sound pretty new to our fans
To be honest, I want to see you, I miss you
I want to cry on your shoulders, I want to cry
We filmed a music video for our fans though!
We had it filmed a year ago
We finally get to show it to everyone
We had to cry in the MV...
The three of us cried a lot, but Min-Ah couldn't
I cried so much I look swollen on screen
I heard the song makes people want to cry
(Q. Who becomes the most sentimental in fall?) I do
Your skin matches the season very well
Am I that dark? Do I look really tan on screen right now?
I found out something shocking about Hye Ri
You know when you mix the base make-up
I mean there are base products for girls
but Hye Ri mixes men's base make-up...
We go crazy if we're not fed on time
We have to eat on time, even if it's a snack...
That happens when we skip meals
Q. You ask your fans if they've eaten
Because I'm curious, I see them all the time
So I ask them if they've eaten...
Some think I ask that because I have nothing else to say
But I'm going to keep asking it
Our fans keep doing that now though
I mean, once we were on stage
and like four people in the front row...
Our favorite food? Beef, of course
Our members love meat and we can eat a lot
So when the other male groups say
they order five buckets of chicken a week...
I mean we order two, three buckets at a time
What's the big deal about five?
So Jin has the most girl fans
I was at the airport the other day, and I looked back
I see Yu Ra surrounded by male fans
And I look around, I see all these female fans!
When I'm not wearing make-up, I try to cover up with sunglasses
Otherwise, we get photographed in some terrible ways
Actually she was even wearing sunglasses
Our fans don't post those pictures
Sometimes, they take pictures like professionals
Once they gave me an album for my birthday
It was so nice, it's my treasure
When I look at it when I get older...
I mean, I'll remember how I'll looked!
Mommy! ... That's going to feel weird
(Q. Hyeri, you've been to the army) Yes, I have
She's been acting like a soldier for a while
She kept talking in the army style...
It was hard for me to talk normally again
That would get her into so much trouble
(Q. Would you like to go again?) No way
Would you like to go back?
I said, do you want to go back?
(Q. How do fans start liking GIRL'S DAY?) Hye Ri
(Q. Your favorite nicknames?) Bing-gu (Silly), Heuk-gu (Black dog)
There's no way out once you start liking us
(Q. Last chance to stop the fans from leaving?) More?
We've shown you all this time!
Hello, I'm the youngest and cutest Hye Ri!
I'm the youngest and cutest Hye Ri
Let me go again, just the face
I thought Yu Ra was the cutest when...
She sat on the couch like this...
about what our fans want to see from us
Photobombing... do you know how to do this?
I seriously just remembered your ponytail
Looking back on our earlier performances
I think we had a bigger energy than did other groups
And we're all doing something outside the group
I'd say we're all off to a good start on that too
So whether as a group or solo, I think we'll be strong...
Dear daisies, thank you for your support
and for always being with us
I hope we got you joining as a GIRL'S DAY  fan
I just hope this doesn't become the way out...

title: #hashtag(해시태그): GIRL'S DAY(걸스데이) _ I miss you(보고싶어) [ENG/JPN/CHN SUB]

comments.author: Fanianna Charpentier

comments.text:
I think this interview perfectly encapsulates Girl's Day's rocketing 
momentum right at this point of time and why we just can't help but fall in 
love with them.
What I get is an image of this: The riot that is Hyeri who is just 
completely comfortable with how shamelessly, engagingly mad she is, Yura 
the ever-capable silly sidekick, Minah now taking a step back on the 
silliness levels but displaying her growth in maturity while still 
maintaining the ever-so-sweet image, and SoJin just letting her girls go 
bonkers but always closely keeping an eye on them. Now that's one heck of 
an image.﻿

of girl's day :P
